subject: GT2 Steering wheel
description_text:
Hi there,
I am just inquiring about your gt2 steering wheel i am currently in the
process of buying a whole new rig and i wanted to know do i need your qr
for the wheel or just the wheel to fit the moza r9 base i know i will need
the moza qr but i'm not sure do i need yours as well i assume not i'm a
little new into the high end sim racing that's all hopefully i don't sound
stupid when asking this question.
Best Regards,

Jamie
